data.name: DistriFS
data.description: Distributed, efficient and secure filesystem coded in Go

evidence: README mentions releases: "Participating in the DistriFS network is easy! Releases are built every minor version in Github Releases for Windows, macOS and Linux. Configure and run a server, then register it on the official inde"
"DistriFS is a filesystem allowing for decentralized access to files of your choice through a file network. It is comparable to torrenting, IPFS and Storj."
"Participating in the DistriFS network is easy! Releases are built every minor version in Github Releases for Windows, macOS and Linux."
